reporter_caption.center: MATTEOSIN v. NATIONAL INSURANCE COMPANY, 44 N.J. 582 (1965)

caption.center: DER MATTEOSIN, ET AL., PLAINTIFFS-PETITIONERS, v. NATIONAL INSURANCE

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Superior Court, Appellate Division.

Messrs. Breslin Breslin and Mr. Charles Rodgers for the petitioner.
